meanings.definition: In keeping with good taste and propriety; polite and restrained.
meanings.sent1: She always wore decorous attire to formal events.
meanings.sent2: The decorous behavior of the guests impressed the host.
meanings.sent3: The decorous penguin politely offered a fish to its friend.
meanings.sent4: The decorous garden stood out with its elegant arrangement of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The decorous painting captured the essence of sophistication and grace.

meanings.definition: Characterized by dignified propriety in conduct, manners, appearance, character, etc.
meanings.sent1: The decorous gentleman greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: Her decorous speech at the conference reflected her professionalism.
meanings.sent3: The decorous cat sat with impeccable posture, looking regal.
meanings.sent4: The decorous oak tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The decorous sunset painted the sky with hues of elegance and poise.
